Description of incident: "We were recently alerted to a possible security breach involving account information that had occurred several years ago. We immediately investigated the situation and are reaching out to share what we've learned and how we are protecting your data.Our investigation showed that email addresses and passwords for CafeMom accounts created before July 2011 were compromised at some point in the past.  At this time, we have found no evidence of unauthorized access or wrongdoing and teh systems that powered cafemom.com in 2011 are no longer the systems that run the site today."
